Class PlaySound

java.lang.Object
PlaySound
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PlaySound
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
this class handles the sounds and musics of the game. the boolean unmute shows whether the player asks to play sounds or not. if it is true the sounds are played and when it is false the will be mute.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlaySound​(boolean unmute)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isUnmute()  
    void playBackgroundSound()
    this method plays the sound of the game frame.
    void playChomp()
    when a zombie eating a plant, this method plays the sound of eating.
    void playGameOver()
    thie method plays the music of the game over.
    void playLawnmower()
    this method plays the sound of a lawn mower if a lawn mower starts running.
    void playMenuSound()
    this method plays the music of the menu frame.
    void playSunClicked()
    this method plays the sound of coins whenever a sun is clicked in the game panel.
    void playZombieComing()
    when zombies are coming this method is called.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlaySound

      public PlaySound​(boolean unmute)

  • Method Details

    • playBackgroundSound

      public void playBackgroundSound()
      this method plays the sound of the game frame. it has a loop to repeat the music while the game is run. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playMenuSound

      public void playMenuSound()
      this method plays the music of the menu frame. it has a loop to repeat rhe music while the menu frame is open. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playSunClicked

      public void playSunClicked()
      this method plays the sound of coins whenever a sun is clicked in the game panel. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playLawnmower

      public void playLawnmower()
      this method plays the sound of a lawn mower if a lawn mower starts running. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playGameOver

      public void playGameOver()
      thie method plays the music of the game over. it is a loop to repeat the music while the corresponding window is open. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playChomp

      public void playChomp()
      when a zombie eating a plant, this method plays the sound of eating. if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • playZombieComing

      public void playZombieComing()
      when zombies are coming this method is called. in each game this method is called thrice. (at the beginning of each wave of the game) if unmute is false, this method won't play the music.

    • stopMenu

      public void stopMenu()
      this method stops the music of the menu frame. (if it was played before)

    • stopBackground

      public void stopBackground()
      this method stops the music of the game frame. (if it was played before)

    • stopGameOver

      public void stopGameOver()
      this method stops the music of the game over. (if it was played before)

    • stopChomp

      public void stopChomp()
      this method stops the sound of the chomping. (if it was played before)

    • isUnmute

      public boolean isUnmute()

    • setUnmute

      public void setUnmute​(boolean unmute)
